name: bigger-ore-stacks_1-1
title: Bigger Ore Stacks
author: PablitusElMakina
description: Sets the stack size of ores (and Sulfur) in the base game to 250. Also support Brevven Ore Mods: Aluminum Carbon Lead Silicon Titanium Tungsten & Zirconium. Original Creator Mod by detourious. Updated by PablitusElMakina. ONLY VANILLA ORE version 0.0.3
